name: Justin Ji
short_description: Computer Science student at Harvard University (Class of 2026) with research experience at The Summer Science Program. Justin has participated in creative projects including a Chipotle + David Dobrik TikTok Contest.
long_description:
Justin Ji is currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at Harvard University, expected to graduate in 2026. Prior to Harvard, he attended Gretchen Whitney High School from 2018 to 2022. 

In the summer of 2021, Justin worked as a Researcher at The Summer Science Program for 2 months, gaining valuable research experience. His professional background, though limited as he is early in his academic career, demonstrates his interest in scientific research.

Justin has shown creativity through projects like the Chipotle + David Dobrik TikTok Contest in May 2020. His LinkedIn activity suggests interests in technology, engineering, language learning, and cultural immersion, as evidenced by his engagement with posts about AI models, robotics, and language programs like Harvard Taipei Academy.

With 2K followers and 500+ connections on LinkedIn, Justin is building a professional network while pursuing his education. His personal website (justinji.com) likely contains additional information about his projects, interests, and accomplishments.
